price: Kështu Allahu, i Plotfuqishmi, i Urti, të frymëzon ty (o Muhamed), ashtu siç i ka frymëzuar edhe ata para teje.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ يُوحِيٓ إِلَيۡكَ وَإِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِكَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: kadhālika yūḥī ilayka wa-ilā alladhīna min qablika al-lahu al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
